suppress.notes: Pulled in by a number of dependencies, including spring. We are on the latest 1.x.x version. Will need to wait until parent dependencies update to 2.x.x released in feb, therefore suppressing
The vulnerability exists in the latest version of lib too. Need to wait for new version with the fix
Pull in by spring boot. The latest version of spring boot v3.1.1 is still using netty v4.1.93 where the vulnerability still exists
